RESUMO-CV.TEXTO-RESUMO-CV-RH: Possui graduao em Bacharel Em Engenharia de Infra Estrutura Aeronutica pelo Instituto Tecnolgico de Aeronutica (1984), mestrado em Matemtica pela Pontifcia Universidade Catlica do Rio de Janeiro (1989) e doutorado em Matemtica - Courant Institute Of Mathematical Sciences (1994). Foi pesquisador associado da Associao Instituto Nacional de Matemtica Pura e Aplicada. Atualmente Professor do Departamento de Matemtica do Worcester Polytechnic Institute. Tem experincia na rea de Matemtica, com nfase em Anlise Numrica

OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES.OUTRAS-INFORMACOES-RELEVANTES:
Bolsas de estudo ou pesquisa
NSF CISE Fellowship Award, 1994-1996 Dean's Dissertaion Fellowship Award, 1993-1994 Bolsa de Doutorado do CNPq, 1989-1993 Bolsa de Mestrado do CNPq, 1987-1989 Bolsa de Pesquisa do Instituto de Pesquisas Espaciais, 1984
Palestras proferidas
-Twelth International Conference on Domain Decomposition Methods in Science and Engineering, Chiba, Japan, Oct, 1999. -Workshop on Nonlinear Partial Differential Equations and Applications to Materials, Minnesota, May, 1999. -Finite Element Circus at University of Maryland, organized by Yvo Babuska, Nov, (1998). -Numerical Analysis Seminar, Courant Institute of Mathematical Sciences, Oct, (1998). -Finite Element Circus at University of Denver, organized by Yvo Babuska, May, (1998). -SIAM Northeast Regional Mathematics in Industry Workshop, Worcester, May, (1998). -University of Maryland Baltimore-County, Fev, (1998). -University of Colorado at Denver, Jan, (1998). -A Numerical Analysis Conference in Honor of Olof B. Widlund on the Occasion of his 60th Birthday, New York, Jann, (1998). -Tenth International Conference on Domain Decomposition Methods in Science and Engineering, Boulder, Aug (1997). -Third IMACS International Symposium on Iterative Methods in Scientific Computation, Jackson Hole, Wyoming, July (1997). -Eighth Copper Mountain Conference on Multigrid Methods, Copper Mountain, Colorado, April (1997). -Eighth SIAM Conference on Parallel Processing for Scientific Computing, Minneapolis, Minnesota, March (1997). - CERFACS International Linear Algebra Year, Workshop on Iterative Methods, Toulouse, France, June (1996). -Ninth International Conference on Domain Decomposition Methods in Science and Engineering, Ullensvang, Norway, June (1996). -Copper Mountain Conference on Iterative Methods, Copper Mountain, Colorado, April (1996).

Grupo de Anlise Numrica do Department of Computer Science, UCB. Pesquisa em mtodos de decomposio de domnios, discretizaes hbridas Full-Potential-Euler, mtodos iterativos com precondiciamento para fluidos compressveis, ``overset'' mtodos, ``mortar elements'', dinmica de fluidos computacional, computao paralela.
